remarks: ` X ` is in the periodic partition, when the considered interval is centered at ` X ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem6.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem6.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem6.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem6.t $e |- T = ( B - A ) $.
fourierdlem6.5 $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem6.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ZZ ) $.
fourierdlem6.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ZZ ) $.
fourierdlem6.iltj $e |- ( ph -> I < J ) $.
fourierdlem6.iel $e |- ( ph -> ( X + ( I x. T ) ) e. ( A [,] B ) ) $.
fourierdlem6.jel $e |- ( ph -> ( X + ( J x. T ) ) e. ( A [,] B ) ) $.
fourierdlem6 $p |- ( ph -> J = ( I + 1 ) ) $.
